definition: to descend to the world (of immortals)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
variant of 凡[fan2]

sentences.english: The granddaughter of the Goddess of Heaven visited the earth.
sentences.chinese: 王母娘娘的外孙女下凡到人间。

sentences.english: And so, the people of the moon came down to live.
sentences.chinese: 从而月之民下凡到了地上生活。

sentences.english: As if some deus ex machina had wrought these changes overnight.
sentences.chinese: 就好像某神灵下凡，一夜之间带来了这些变化。

sentences.english: Snow White looked at, is nian saw immediately loudly exclaimed the child.
sentences.chinese: 白雪见状，立即大声惊呼这孩子是神仙下凡。

sentences.english: An angel didn't come down from heaven. I have one beside me all the time — a guardian angel.
sentences.chinese: 天使不会下凡，然而我身边却始终有一位守护天使。

sentences.english: So she got into the cycle of reincarnation to Lin's family Meizhou.
sentences.chinese: 于是龙女便下凡投胎在湄洲林家。

sentences.english: Great, dad. So can I go down now?
sentences.chinese: 太好了，玉帝。那我现在可以下凡去了？

sentences.english: Christ came down with some Pine-Sol.
sentences.chinese: 基督带着派素清洁剂下凡来了。

definition: the secular world
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
Jade Emperor
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
reincarnation or transmigration (Buddhism)
the Jade Emperor
middle of the forehead/imperial court/heaven
Xuan Nü, a fairy in Chinese mythology
lit. to descend to earth (of an immortal)/to be born
celestial troops and generals (idiom)/fig. superior forces
Erlangshen, Chinese deity
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
elf/leprechaun
Gods and Buddhas
ordinary person/mortal/earthling
